pages.text: With the possession of this new gem, I believe solely that this gem has no other purpose than that of transporting me to another realm, which although disappointing that I am unable to find a way to use it for weaponry and armor, is still intriguing nonetheless.
The blueprint for the gateway are as follows:
pages.name: The Jalsphire Portal

pages.text: The prison realm, is in need of yet another charge known as the Jalsphire Charge.
